statements: UPDATE articles SET title='New Title 1', authors='Author 1' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET publication_date='2022-09-12', abstract='Updated abstract text', title='New Title 2' WHERE article_id = 2;
UPDATE articles SET title='New Title', authors='John Doe' WHERE article_id=1;
UPDATE articles SET publication_date='2022-01-01', abstract='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.' WHERE title='Sample Article';
UPDATE peer_reviewed_articles SET published_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE research_collaborations SET funding_source = 'National Science Foundation', collaborators = 'John Doe, Jane Smith' WHERE collaboration_id = 2;
UPDATE peer_reviewed_articles SET title = 'Updated Title', authors = 'John Doe', published_date = '2022-09-15', doi = '123456789', abstract = 'This is an updated abstract' WHERE article_id = 1;

UPDATE research_collaborations SET project_title = 'New Project', funding_source = 'National Science Foundation', start_date = '2022-10-01', end_date = '2023-03-31', collaborators = 'Jane Smith', description = 'This is a new description' WHERE collaboration_id = 3;
UPDATE articles SET title = 'New Title', authors = ARRAY['Author1', 'Author2'], abstract = 'New Abstract' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE collaborations SET collaboration_type = 'New Collaboration Type' WHERE collaboration_id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET abstract = 'New abstract value' WHERE article_id = 123;
UPDATE authors SET email = 'newemail@example.com', affiliation = 'New affiliation' WHERE author_id = 456;
UPDATE articles SET title='New Title', publication_date='2022-09-15' WHERE article_id=1;
UPDATE authors SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE author_id=2;
UPDATE articles SET publication_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET email = 'new_email@example.com', affiliation = 'New Affiliation' WHERE author_id = 2;
UPDATE articles SET title = 'New Title', author = 'New Author' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE collaborations SET author_id = 2, article_id = 2 WHERE collaboration_id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET title='New Title', author='John Doe', publish_date='2022-12-31', abstract='Updated abstract', keywords='new keyword' WHERE article_id=1;
UPDATE authors SET affiliation='New University', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE author_id=2;
